metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24065 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package cookiecutter before 2.1.1 are vulnerable to Command Injection via hg argument injection. When calling the cookiecutter function from Python code with the checkout parameter, it is passed to the hg checkout command in a way that additional flags can be set. The additional flags can be used to perform a command injection.

criterions.comment: cookiecutter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
